    class Solargraph::Pin::Block

    Attributes

    receiver[R]

    The signature of the method that receives this block.

    @return [Parser::AST::Node]

    Public Class Methods

    new(receiver: nil, args: [], **splat) click to toggle source
    Calls superclass method 
    # File lib/solargraph/pin/block.rb, line 10
def initialize receiver: nil, args: [], **splat
  super(splat)
  @receiver = receiver
  @parameters = args
end

    Public Instance Methods

    binder() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/solargraph/pin/block.rb, line 25
def binder
  @binder || context
end
    nearly?(other) click to toggle source
    Calls superclass method 
    # File lib/solargraph/pin/block.rb, line 39
def nearly? other
  return false unless super
  # @todo Trying to not to block merges too much
  # receiver == other.receiver and parameters == other.parameters
  true
end
    parameter_names() click to toggle source

    @return [Array<String>]

    # File lib/solargraph/pin/block.rb, line 35
def parameter_names
  @parameter_names ||= parameters.map{|p| p.split(/[ =:]/).first.gsub(/^(\*{1,2}|&)/, '')}
end
    parameters() click to toggle source

    @return [Array<String>]

    # File lib/solargraph/pin/block.rb, line 30
def parameters
  @parameters ||= []
end
    rebind(context) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/solargraph/pin/block.rb, line 16
def rebind context
  @rebound = true
  @binder = context unless context.undefined?
end
    rebound?() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/solargraph/pin/block.rb, line 21
def rebound?
  @rebound ||= false
end
